MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY11 postcode area of Oswestry affecting properties in Oakhurst Road, Gobowen Road and surrounding area. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply and we expect restoration by 9:30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:05am on 23rd December 2020.
